014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.lang.constant.Constable;
017import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
018import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
019import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
020
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Objects;
024import java.util.Optional;
025
026import java.util.function.Predicate;
027
028import javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType;
029import javax.lang.model.type.PrimitiveType;
030import javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind;
031import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
032
033import org.microbean.constant.Constables;
034
035import org.microbean.lang.Equality;
036import org.microbean.lang.Lang;
037import org.microbean.lang.Lang.SameTypeEquality;
038
039import org.microbean.lang.type.DelegatingTypeMirror;
040
041import org.microbean.qualifier.NamedAttributeMap;
042
043import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
044import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_boolean;
045import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Collection;
046import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.FALSE;
047import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.TRUE;
048import static java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC;
049
050import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_Assignability;
051import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_BeanSelectionCriteria;
052import static org.microbean.bean.InterceptorBindings.anyInterceptorBinding;
053import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.anyQualifier;
054import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.defaultQualifier;
055import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.defaultQualifiers;
056
057import static org.microbean.lang.ConstantDescs.CD_TypeMirror;
058
059public final record BeanSelectionCriteria(Assignability assignability, // not included in equality/hashcode
060                                          TypeMirror type,
061                                          List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes,
062                                          boolean box)
063  implements Constable {
064
065
066  /*
067   * Static fields.
068   */
069
070
071  private static final Equality EQUALITY_IGNORING_ANNOTATIONS = new Equality(false);
072
073
074  /*
075   * Instance fields.
076   */
077
078
079  /*
080   * Constructors.
081   */
082
083
084  public BeanSelectionCriteria(final TypeMirror type) {
085    this(new Assignability(), type);
086  }
087
088  public BeanSelectionCriteria(final TypeMirror type, final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
089    this(new Assignability(), type, attributes);
090  }
091
092  public BeanSelectionCriteria(final Assignability assignability, final TypeMirror type) {
093    this(assignability, type, defaultQualifiers());
094  }
095
096  public BeanSelectionCriteria(final Assignability assignability,
097                               final TypeMirror type,
098                               final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
099    this(assignability, type, attributes, true);
100  }
101
102  public BeanSelectionCriteria {
103    if (assignability == null) {
104      assignability = new Assignability();
105    }
106    type = DelegatingTypeMirror.of(validateType(type, box), assignability.typeAndElementSource(), SameTypeEquality.INSTANCE);
107    attributes = List.copyOf(attributes);
108  }
109
110
111  /*
112   * Instance methods.
113   */
114
115
116  public final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> interceptorBindings() {
117    return InterceptorBindings.interceptorBindings(this.attributes());
118  }
119
120  public final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> qualifiers() {
121    return Qualifiers.qualifiers(this.attributes());
122  }
123
124  public final boolean selects(final Id id) {
125    return this.selects(id.types().types(), id.attributes());
126  }
127
128  public final boolean selects(final Bean<?> bean) {
129    return this.selects(bean.id().types().types(), bean.id().attributes());
130  }
131
132  public final boolean selects(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria) {
133    return this.selects(List.of(beanSelectionCriteria.type()), beanSelectionCriteria.attributes());
134  }
135
136  public final boolean selects(final TypeMirror type) {
137    return this.selects(List.of(type), List.of());
138  }
139
140  public final boolean selects(final Collection<? extends TypeMirror> types) {
141    return this.selects(types, List.of());
142  }
143
144  public final boolean selects(final TypeMirror type, final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
145    return this.selects(List.of(type), attributes);
146  }
147
148  public final boolean selects(final Collection<? extends TypeMirror> types,
149                               final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
150    return this.selectsQualifiers(attributes) && this.selectsInterceptorBindings(attributes) && this.selectsTypeFrom(types);
151  }
152
153  private final boolean selectsInterceptorBindings(final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
154    final List<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> herBindings = InterceptorBindings.interceptorBindings(attributes);
155    if (herBindings.isEmpty()) {
156      return this.interceptorBindings().isEmpty();
157    } else if (herBindings.size() == 1 && anyInterceptorBinding(herBindings.iterator().next())) {
158      return true;
159    }
160    final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> ibs = this.interceptorBindings();
161    return ibs.size() == herBindings.size() && ibs.containsAll(herBindings) && herBindings.containsAll(ibs);
162  }
163
164  private final boolean selectsQualifiers(final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
165    final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> myQualifiers = this.qualifiers();
166    final List<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> herQualifiers = Qualifiers.qualifiers(attributes);
167    if (myQualifiers.isEmpty()) {
168      // Pretend I had [@Default] and she had [@Default, @Any].
169      return herQualifiers.isEmpty() || containsAll(herQualifiers::contains, defaultQualifiers());
170    } else if (herQualifiers.isEmpty()) {
171      for (final NamedAttributeMap<?> myQualifier : myQualifiers) {
172        if (anyQualifier(myQualifier) || defaultQualifier(myQualifier)) {
173          // I had [@Default] or [@Any] or [@Default, @Any]; pretend she had [@Default, @Any].
174          return true;
175        }
176      }
177      return false;
178    } else {
179      return containsAll(herQualifiers::contains, myQualifiers);
180    }
181  }
182
183  final boolean selectsTypeFrom(final Collection<? extends TypeMirror> types) {
184    return this.assignability.oneMatches(this.type(), types);
185  }
186
187  @Override // Constable
188  public final Optional<DynamicConstantDesc<BeanSelectionCriteria>> describeConstable() {
189    return this.assignability().describeConstable()
190      .flatMap(assignabilityDesc -> Lang.describeConstable(this.type())
191               .flatMap(typeDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.attributes())
192                        .map(attributesDesc -> DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
193                                                                      MethodHandleDesc.ofMethod(STATIC,
194                                                                                                CD_BeanSelectionCriteria,
195                                                                                                "of",
196                                                                                                MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_BeanSelectionCriteria,
197                                                                                                                  CD_Assignability,
198                                                                                                                  CD_TypeMirror,
199                                                                                                                  CD_Collection,
200                                                                                                                  CD_boolean)),
201                                                                      assignabilityDesc,
202                                                                      typeDesc,
203                                                                      attributesDesc,
204                                                                      this.box ? TRUE : FALSE))));
205  }
206
207  @Override // Object
208  public final int hashCode() {
209    int hashCode = 17;
210    hashCode = 31 * hashCode + this.type().hashCode();
211    hashCode = 31 * hashCode + this.attributes().hashCode();
212    hashCode = 31 * hashCode + (this.box() ? 1 : 0);
213    return hashCode;
214  }
215
216  @Override // Object
217  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
218    if (other == this) {
219      return true;
220    } else if (other != null && other.getClass() == this.getClass()) {
221      final BeanSelectionCriteria her = (BeanSelectionCriteria)other;
222      return
223        Objects.equals(this.type(), her.type()) &&
224        Objects.equals(this.attributes(), her.attributes()) &&
225        Objects.equals(this.box(), her.box());
226    } else {
227      return false;
228    }
229  }
230
231  @Override
232  public final String toString() {
233    return
234      this.getClass().getSimpleName() + "[" +
235      "type=" + this.type() + ", " +
236      "attributes=" + this.attributes() + ", " +
237      "box=" + this.box() +
238      "]";
239  }
240
241
242  /*
243   * Static methods.
244   */
245
246
247  private static final TypeMirror validateType(final TypeMirror type, final boolean box) {
248    final TypeKind k = type.getKind();
249    if (box && k.isPrimitive()) {
250      return Lang.boxedClass((PrimitiveType)type).asType();
251    }
252    return switch (k) {
253    case ARRAY, BOOLEAN, BYTE, CHAR, DECLARED, DOUBLE, FLOAT, INT, LONG, SHORT -> type;
254    case ERROR, EXECUTABLE, INTERSECTION, MODULE, NONE, NULL, OTHER, PACKAGE, TYPEVAR, UNION, VOID, WILDCARD ->
255      throw new IllegalArgumentException("type: " + type);
256    };
257  }
258
259  // Returns the component type of t if is an array type. Returns t in all other cases.
260  private static final TypeMirror componentType(final TypeMirror t) {
261    return t.getKind() == TypeKind.ARRAY ? ((ArrayType)t).getComponentType() : t;
262  }
263
264  // Returns the element type of t if t is an array type. Returns t in all other cases.
265  private static final TypeMirror elementType(final TypeMirror t) {
266    return t.getKind() == TypeKind.ARRAY ? elementType(componentType(t)) : t;
267  }
268
269  private static final boolean containsAll(final Predicate<? super Object> p, final Iterable<?> i) {
270    for (final Object o : i) {
271      if (!p.test(o)) {
272        return false;
273      }
274    }
275    return true;
276  }
277
278  // Called by describeConstable().
279  public static final BeanSelectionCriteria of(final Assignability a,
280                                               final TypeMirror type,
281                                               final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes,
282                                               final boolean box) {
283    return new BeanSelectionCriteria(a, type, List.copyOf(attributes), box);
284  }
285
286}
